Serving All of Duval County

Duval County's Trusted Stump Grinding Service

Stump Masters Jax proudly serves all of Duval County with professional stump grinding and tree removal services. As a veteran-owned, locally-operated business, we understand the unique needs of Duval County properties, from historic neighborhoods to modern developments.

Duval County is home to Jacksonville, Florida's largest city by area, along with beautiful beach communities like Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, and Neptune Beach. We serve every corner of the county with the same dedication and professionalism.

Whether you're in urban Jacksonville, the coastal beaches, or suburban neighborhoods, we offer same-day and next-day stump grinding service throughout Duval County.

Our Duval County Services

Stump Grinding

Professional stump grinding services throughout Duval County. We remove stumps below ground level, preparing your property for landscaping or construction.

Tree Trimming

Expert tree trimming and pruning services up to 15 feet. Keep your Duval County property safe and beautiful with professional tree maintenance.

Debris Removal

Complete tree debris haul away services. We clean up after stump grinding, tree trimming, or storm damage throughout Duval County.
